desc.p: A valid routine which will be used to populate the values in the EB.FREE.MESSAGE record produced by an Application mentioned above,
by using the HANDOFF record that gets produced after authorization of a transaction.
Mandatory if Application name is present.
Accepts valid days format. If defined, will be used to default TRACER.DAYS field in EB.FREE.MESSAGE file if it has not been specified in the COUNTRY file.
Tracer days should be like +NW or NNW where N stands for number of days and W stands for Working days.
This multi-value field indicates the APPLICATIONS that will support the Tracer mechanism. Whenever an EB.FREE.MESSAGE record
is produced, the Application which created the message record is identified from this field and the default values are identified using this

p.p: Valid APPLICATION of Type H or U is allowed .

desc.p: Valid Company code will be used as the ID for this file
Any valid EB.ACTIVITY record can be specified here and the HANDOFF record produced by this activity is used by the Tracer routine
specified above to populate and update the relevant Tracer records
